tool_description: Deezer is the No. 1 site for listening to music on demand. Discover more than 30 million tracks, create your own playlists, and share your favourite tracks.

api_list.name: Infos
api_list.description: Get the infos about the api in the current country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deezerdevs-deezer.p.rapidapi.com/infos"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deezerdevs-deezer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://deezerdevs-deezer.p.rapidapi.com/infos"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deezerdevs-deezer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
